channel.title: Blurrs client changing ports question
channel.description:
How do i change ports on a 317 Blurrs Client Found these lines but it lets me connect to the server but then it crashes the client.
[code] aClass24_1168 = new Class24(this, -978, method19(5555 + anInt958));//43594 [/code] When i change it from 43594 to 5555 it connects to the server but it crashes
Also found this line [code] return new URL("http://+Gui.server+" + (43594 + anInt958));//43594 [/code]
and this line [code] aSocket832 = method19(43594);//43594 [/code]
What do i need to edit?

item.title: Blurrs client changing ports question
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

On the line below, maybe change the “5555” to 43594? Idk. And make sure you portforwarded the right way.

aClass24_1168 = new Class24(this, -978, method19(5555 + anInt958));//43594

Read full topic

item.title: Blurrs client changing ports question
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

How do i change ports on a 317 Blurrs Client
Found these lines but it lets me connect to the server but then it crashes the client.

            aClass24_1168 = new Class24(this, -978, method19(5555 + anInt958));//43594

When i change it from 43594 to 5555 it connects to the server but it crashes

Also found this line

                return new URL("http://+Gui.server+" + (43594 + anInt958));//43594

and this line

What do i need to edit?
